name: Animated fox
description:
Animated fox 2d game sprite

Animations include idle, walk, run, jump and die. As usual the download folder for this game asset includes a fully rigged Spriter puppet, five premade animations, HD animated spritesheets with the option to export spritesheets upto 2000 pixels per frame, Hd png body pieces for rerigging in other software such as unity, and a scalable vector file
